title: (Repost) Was my ban justified?
body:
I just recognized I poste din the incorrect section so this is a repost. Yesterday I played a game and upon conclusion I received a permanent ban. I don't believe what I said constituted as toxic but maybe you guys can help understand if I was justly banned. The worst thing from the logs I can see is when I mentioned that my botlane bitched about the jungler ganking my lane more often but I don't think that it was hurtful. The only zero tolerance word I believe I used was N-word and people in my community use that as a term of endearment. We've taken away the power of a word used to oppress us and took away its power. If anyone is curious <removed by moderation>. Anyway, I truly believe I wasn't toxic in these two games because since my last ban, I've been watching what I say.

replies.body:
You can share your chat logs, but no other circumstances will allow for slurs, such as what your posted video contained.

If you have any questions about this moderation, feel free to reach out to us in the [Boards Discord](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification).

To be honest, I appreciate the thought but I'll just be moving on from LoL. I've invested to much time\money in my current account and Riot doesn't revoke permanent bans. Lesson learned, I'll just mute team mates in whatever game i play next.
Riot doesnt tolerate the n Word. Since this is a permaban im guessing you had a 14 day Ban before?
Yeah over the summer I had a 14 day ban but that was like june or july.
Depending on how much you played and what Kind of behaviour you showed this can be too little to drop a punishment Tier.
I would ban you for posting this :P
How is this constructive and help to further the discussion?

> [{quoted}](name=Minidz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4ht29sVG,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-11-20T20:21:54.966+0000)
>
> How is this constructive and help to further the discussion?

I don't think the forums are a place to bring your grievance. 
~We can't help you.
~We are only hearing your side.
~Try submit a request for review.

I did mention that although you guys can't help me I was looking for opinions. I do plan to contact Riot and see what they're willing to do about the situation. The worst that they can say is no or a lack of a response.

Well, your teammates probably had a few nerve ticks playing with you. Base on what I read a chat ban most likely, perma ban for this seems severe, but again if this kind of behaviour is common in your games and if you've been warned before then it's good riddance to you sir.
I mean it wasn't common in my games I haven't been banned since June/July. I've had great games since then.

Taken the power away from the N word? So if some old white guy calls a black guy the n word angrily, you feel nothing cuz the word has lost all power? Stop with that bullshit. It only loses power when its convenient, and regains its power when someone needs to be seen as a victim, so the "power" that has been "taken away" is suddenly invoked when someone can gain something from it. Its just as powerful as it always has been, hence, youre banned. You dont get to decide the meaning and impact of words just because youre black lol.

I didn't decide to reclaim it, my community has reclaimed the word, ask any person of color and they can corroborate what I've mentioned above. 
A common feature of language is the denotation and connotation of a word. Words change meanings based on the context they are used in. If someone uses the N word in a racist context, obviously it has racist intention. If the chat above, my message does not protray such a message which is why I believe my ban is unjustified. Situations like this are why AI are controversial because they can be trained to detect patterns ( certain words) but not the context in which they were used.

> [{quoted}](name=Minidz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4ht29sVG,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-11-21T23:10:21.334+0000)
>
> I didn't decide to reclaim it, my community has reclaimed the word, ask any person of color and they can corroborate what I've mentioned above. 
> A common feature of language is the denotation and connotation of a word. Words change meanings based on the context they are used in. If someone uses the N word in a racist context, obviously it has racist intention. If the chat above, my message does not protray such a message which is why I believe my ban is unjustified. Situations like this are why AI are controversial because they can be trained to detect patterns ( certain words) but not the context in which they were used.

Well thats the thing actually. Ive heard contradicting opinions from other black people. So i simply say again; you dont get to decide just because youre black. 

It seems its usually the older black people who are still against using the word. Imo, its mostly the youth or those in the rap culture that use the word. I respect elders more than the youth, as they have more life experience to base their views on. Whereas, you probably heard it in rap music and thought it sounded cool. 

Ive heard that too. "Why do you use the n word?" "Cuz it sounds cool!" Lol ive literally heard that as a reason to use it. Nothing to do with "taking its power away". They just wanna sound gangster like their favorite rappers.

I grew up saying the f word (gay slur) to my friends all the time, and they would say the same. Never meant it in a homophobic way. If I said it on here, regardless of my sexuality, it would be treated as hatespeech. Kind of the same thing. We cant go case by case and decide the implication in a game with such a large playerbase. Be careful with your use of hateful words, because you dont get to decide how other people will take it.

I saw "youre annoying" near the top of the chat, and I rolled my eyes. I then saw "team is toxic," "you kids are just bad and toxic," and "sheesh yall annoying gonna ahve to mute and carry" in short succession, and I stopped reading there. You trashed your team like this every 30 seconds on average (given the average match length and the number of messages you wrote), you used a zero-tolerance word (zero... not 1%... ZERO), and you don't think this is toxicity. Unfortunately for your account, it is. You knew you were on thin ice, and this is your idea of good behavior?

You are one of those " Muting all " and continues to shit post in the chat all game. lol

JUST MUTE THEM

The issue comes from knowing if a slur is reclaimed requires context from all parties.  You might know you can reclaim it and use it in a friendly manner but your allies and enemies might not.  And Riot can’t guarantee that situation so, to avoid the racist usage, it’s a zero tolerance word.  So strangers who don’t consent can report you for it.  

The system isn’t perfect but it’s didficult to cover niche cases of reclamation while also protecting others from racist usage.

Yeah I definitely agree with your statement. I'm going to shoot Rito an email to see if they'd be willing to work with me. My games since my ban should indicate that my behavior had improved in between bans.
